title: Ijiwaru na Kuchibiru
sinopse:
A collection of one-shots.

1. Ijiwaru na Kuchibiru (Ill-Natured Lip)
2. Ienai Junjou (Unspeakable Innocence)
3. Otonari-san (Neighbor Love)
4. Sokubaku no Kagi (The Key of Bonds)
5. Kiss wa Mitsu yori Amaku (A Kiss Sweeter Than Honey)
6. Mujaki na Egao (Innocent Smile)
